Package com.akkaserverless.javasdk.replicatedentity

Interface ReplicatedEntityCreationContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Context, EntityContext, ReplicatedDataFactory, ReplicatedEntityContext
    public interface ReplicatedEntityCreationContext
extends ReplicatedEntityContext, ReplicatedDataFactory
    Context for Replicated Entity creation.

    This is available for injection into the constructor of a Replicated Entity.
